casebody.data:
John ALICE d/b/a John Alice Export Company, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. ROBETT MANUFACTURING CO., Inc., Defendant-Appellee. No. 71-1095. United States Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. June 4, 1971. Archer D. Smith, III, H. William Con-stangy, Nolan B. Harmon, Harmon & Smith, Atlanta, Ga., for appellant. John L. Westmoreland, James M. Crawford, Westmoreland, Hall & Bryan, Atlanta, Ga., for appellee.

Before GEWIN, BELL, and MORGAN, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM:

We conclude that the judgment of the district court in this matter is correct. See Alice v. Robett Manufacturing Co., Inc., N.D. Ga., 1970, 328 F.Supp. 1377.

Affirmed.
